info.name: Minimize active tab, remove favicons on others
info.description:
An experiment that:
  • Removes title from the active tab
  • Removes favicon from inactive tabs (except pinned)
  • Removes close buttons from all tabs
info.additionalInfo:
Useful when you put the address bar next to tabs (CTR/OneLiner/Line). Tab switching has a nice animation :P Based on:
  • style 140646
  • style 99067
Tags: tabs tab bar tabbar small minimal minimalist hide icon pinned tab app tab
